class gstVector : public gstPoint

3D vector class (x,y,z).

From header file: gstVector.h

Constructors and Destructors
gstVectorConstructor.
gstVectorConstructor.
gstVectorConstructor.
gstVectorConstructor.
gstVectorConstructor.
gstVectorConstructor.
Functions
cross Returns cross product of current vector and vector a.
distance Returns the magnitude of projection from point a onto vector.
dot Returns dot product of current vector and vector a.
getLongestAxisComponent Return number of longest axis component of vector (0=x, 1=y, 2=z).
getSecondLongestAxisComponent Return number of longest axis component of vector (0=x, 1=y, 2=z).
getShortestAxisComponent Return number of shortest axis component of vector (0=x, 1=y, 2=z).
norm Return vector magnitude.
normalize Normalize vector.
normalizeReturnNorm Normalize and return norm.
